name: the world changes (with) you
description:
a puzzle platformer about the misadventures of a slime, made in 2 weeks during My First Game Jam: Summer 2020. 

controls:

moveleft and right arrow keys change shape up and down arrow keys restart level                          R zoom in/out                          Zpause                         P

how to play: 

use the shape changing mechanic to finish the levels! once you get to the central level (the one with the chest), finish the levels on the left and right. touch a lock each time you complete a level to open the chest, then proceed through the hole on the bottom and use the new power you obtained to break it wide open! keep going from there until the end, where a special cutscene awaits you!

install instructions:

download the zip, extract it, then open the exe file
